133.sentence: Very fast powerup and great speed when taking multiple pictures.

134.sentence: Very fast powerup and great speed when taking multiple pictures.

135.sentence: Perfect size! Beats the competition by leaps and bounds.

136.sentence: I am impressed with this camera inside and out.

138.sentence: This camera is perfect for the person who wants a compact camera that produces excellent photos in just about any situation.

141.sentence: I have a Canon A 70 , and now this SD500, its amazing, how this little camera produces, such great pics, it even brings out ur pimples on the face.

142.sentence: And the video quality is amazing.

143.sentence: And it fits right in my pocket much easier than my old S30.

144.sentence: I thought this camera was awful and I did tons of research on CNET and other sites.

145.sentence: There were many times when I clicked the automatic shutter and nothing happens.

146.sentence: The controls are hard to manipulate, especially in the dark.

147.sentence: The LCD screen is too small since there are so many cameras that have larger ones
